sentences.english: The acting career plummeted suddenly, he relied on alcohol to release.
sentences.chinese: 演藝事業突然一落千丈，他便借酒澆愁。

sentences.english: Have you got some unfinished business?
He is determined to devote his life to sicence.
sentences.chinese: 他決心把畢生精力貢獻給科學事業。

sentences.english: The popular PE is the major part of the whole career of PE.
sentences.chinese: 羣衆體育是構成整個體育事業的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Xiang Jingyu is the pioneer of Chinese women liberation.
sentences.chinese: 向警予是中國婦女解放事業的先驅。

sentences.english: One should do his best for the cause of world peace.
sentences.chinese: 一小我應該爲世界和平事業盡最大悉力。

sentences.english: Learn is the enterprise of a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 學習是一項終生的事業。

sentences.english: None of this is to detract from Maathai's work, however.
sentences.chinese: 而且，這也不能阻礙馬塔伊所做的事業。

sentences.english: Bostonian education cause is matchless in USA.
sentences.chinese: 波士頓的教育事業在美國首屈一指。

sentences.english: There is a tide in the affairs of men.
Article 66 The trustee of a public trust must not resign without the approval of the regulatory agency of public undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 信託的受託人未經公益事業管理機構批准，不得辭任。

sentences.english: He devoted all his life to the cause of military aviation.
sentences.chinese: 他把一生都獻給了軍用航空事業。

sentences.english: Put exertion instead into your own business and life.
sentences.chinese: 努力專注於你自己的事業和生活。

sentences.english: The song was of great importance and benefits to Zhuge Liang's aspiration and achievement in life.
sentences.chinese: 此事於諸葛亮一生之志節與事業，裨益實多。

sentences.english: No matter what hurdles are placed in our way, somehow we always find a way.
sentences.chinese: 不管我們事業上有多麼困難，我們總會設法闖過去。

sentences.english: Before being engaged in movie business, his favorite was drama.
sentences.chinese: 在從事電影事業之前，黎民偉最喜愛的還是戲劇。
